service.name: cttsov2manager
service.summary: Service managing execution of the ctTSO500v2 workflow.

publishes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
publishes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

subscribes.name: WorkflowRunStateChange
subscribes.summary: Event represents a change in the state of a workflow execution.

markdown.content:
The cttsov2manager service is our own internal service that listens to events from the workflow manager and acts according to its WorkflowRunStateChange events.
